nested_items.name: functionId
nested_items.description: A unique ID representing the Function object.

nested_items.name: functionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Function object.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Function object.

nested_items.name: requestMappingTemplate
nested_items.description: The Function request mapping template. Functions support only the 2018-05-29 version of the request mapping template.

nested_items.name: functionVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the request mapping template. Currently, only the 2018-05-29 version of the template is supported.

nested_items.name: syncConfig
nested_items.description: Describes a Sync configuration for a resolver.

nested_items.name: conflictHandler
nested_items.description: The Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict.

nested_items.name: conflictDetection
nested_items.description: The Conflict Detection strategy to use.

nested_items.name: lambdaConflictHandlerConfig
nested_items.description: The LambdaConflictHandlerConfig when configuring LAMBDA as the Conflict Handler.

nested_items.name: lambdaConflictHandlerArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function to use as the Conflict Handler.

nested_items.name: maxBatchSize
nested_items.description: The maximum batching size for a resolver.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed value is APPSYNC_JS.

nested_items.name: runtimeVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed version is 1.0.0.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The function code that contains the request and response functions. When code is used, the runtime is required. The runtime value must be APPSYNC_JS.
